name: Mawile
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.

attacks.name: Mining
attacks.effect: Search your deck for an Item card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. If that card is a Pokémon Tool card, instead of putting it into your hand, you may attach it to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn’t already have a Pokémon Tool attached to it.

attacks.name: Bite Off
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-GX or a Pokémon-EX, this attack does 30 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
